participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, loves the thrill of skateboarding and spending time with friends.
participant_1.background: my friends are all skateboarders. i've a broken arm. i am a skateboarder. my favourite skater is rob dryden.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and driven, enjoys the fast-paced lifestyle of the city and is always looking for new opportunities.
participant_2.background: i grew up in manhattan. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i plan to go to business school next year.
